attributes.action: assist in returning Concorde’s Certificate of Airworthiness and order British Airways to release the Ownership and certificates on Concorde to allow her to fly again
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Concorde, one of Britains great achivements sits in museums around the world, after being retired by British Airways.

The airplane itself would look great and continue to be an icon for british achivements, eben flying at normal speed, and could be used at great events such as the 2012 olympic games and various fly pasts.

A number of groups are willing to raise funds to enable the Concorde to fly again but continually fall foul of British Airways refusual to give assistance.

Some key points to remember:-

The Public is the beneficial owner of Concorde
CAA say no reason Concorde cannot fly
Winner of the Great British Design Quest 2006
A National icon

Finally, as some press articles will show, unlike British Airways, one of the youngest French Concordes has been allowed to retain her fluids and is started frequently.  Surely this would be a national disgrace using another countries concorde to represent our achivement!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
